FOOTER.INFORMATION: The information provided on this site is for informational purposes only and does not constitute financial advice. Please consult a financial advisor before making investment decisions. Investing carries risks, including the loss of capital.

PROFILE.TITLE: Profile
PROFILE.NAME: Name
PROFILE.PASSWORD_HINT: The password must contain at least 8 characters, including an uppercase letter, a lowercase letter, a number, and a special character (!, @, #, $, %, ^, &, *).

LOGIN.ENTER_DETAILS: Enter your details and start a journey with us!

TERMS_OF_SERVICE.TITLE: Terms of Service
TERMS_OF_SERVICE.ACCEPTANCE_TEXT: By using our website, you accept these Terms of Service. If you do not accept these terms, please do not use our site.
TERMS_OF_SERVICE.CHANGES_TEXT: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. Changes will be posted on this page. Continued use of the site after changes are posted implies acceptance of those changes.
TERMS_OF_SERVICE.DESCRIPTION_TEXT: Our site offers an interactive dashboard that replicates the stock market trend, allowing users to analyze historical data and current market trends. The main features include:
TERMS_OF_SERVICE.DATA_DISPLAY_TEXT: Interactive charts for monitoring stock prices. Integration with financial APIs for real-time data acquisition.
TERMS_OF_SERVICE.FAVORITE_MANAGEMENT_TEXT: A feature that allows users to select and save favorite stocks for quick and personalized access.
TERMS_OF_SERVICE.MARKET_OVERVIEW_TEXT: An exclusive section listing major international stock exchanges, such as NYSE, NASDAQ, LSE, and others, providing users with an up-to-date global market view.
TERMS_OF_SERVICE.USER_RESPONSIBILITIES_TEXT: Users agree not to use the site for illegal or unauthorized activities. The following actions are not allowed:
TERMS_OF_SERVICE.ILLEGAL_ACTIVITIES: Violation of local, state, national, or international laws.
TERMS_OF_SERVICE.DISTRIBUTE_VIRUSES: Distribution of viruses or any other harmful technology.
TERMS_OF_SERVICE.LIMITATION_OF_LIABILITY_TEXT: We are not responsible for any direct, indirect, incidental, special, or consequential damages resulting from the use or inability to use our site. Financial data provided through Twelve Data APIs is for informational purposes and should not be considered financial advice.
TERMS_OF_SERVICE.INTELLECTUAL_PROPERTY_TEXT: All content on the site, including text, graphics, logos, images, and software, is our property or licensed to us and is protected by copyright and trademark laws.
TERMS_OF_SERVICE.PRIVACY_TEXT: Your privacy is important to us. Please read our Privacy Policy to understand how we collect, use, and protect your personal information.
TERMS_OF_SERVICE.APPLICABLE_LAW_TEXT: These Terms of Service are governed and interpreted according to the laws of the State of [state or country name], without regard to conflicts of law principles.
TERMS_OF_SERVICE.CONTACT_TEXT: For any questions regarding these Terms of Service, you can contact us at the Contact Us section.

CANCEL.TITLE: Payment Canceled
CANCEL.MESSAGE: Your payment has been canceled. Please try again. You will be redirected to your profile shortly.

SUCCESS.TITLE: Payment Successful
SUCCESS.MESSAGE: Thank you for your purchase! The payment has been successfully completed. You will be redirected to your profile shortly.

CHECKOUT.ALERT_MESSAGE: Insert an amount greater than zero.

PRIVACY_POLICY.TITLE: Privacy Policy
PRIVACY_POLICY.INTRODUCTION_TEXT: Your privacy is important to us. This privacy policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal information when you use our site.
PRIVACY_POLICY.COLLECTED_INFORMATION_TEXT: We collect information you provide directly to us, such as your name, email address, and any other information you choose to provide.
PRIVACY_POLICY.INFORMATION_USE_TEXT: We use the information collected to provide, maintain, and improve our services, to communicate with you, and to protect our users.
PRIVACY_POLICY.INFORMATION_SHARING_TEXT: We do not share your personal information with third parties without your consent, except where required by law or necessary to provide our services.
PRIVACY_POLICY.INFORMATION_SECURITY_TEXT: We take reasonable security measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, use, or disclosure.
PRIVACY_POLICY.YOUR_RIGHTS_TEXT: You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal information. You can exercise these rights by contacting us at the provided email address.
PRIVACY_POLICY.POLICY_CHANGES_TEXT: We reserve the right to modify this privacy policy at any time. Changes will be posted on this page. Continued use of the site after changes are posted implies acceptance of those changes.
PRIVACY_POLICY.CONTACT_TEXT: For any questions regarding this privacy policy, you can contact us at the Contact Us section.
